sentences.en: A general anesthetic is given before or during surgical procedures.
sentences.cn: 全身麻醉应在手术前或手术过程中施予.

sentences.en: Diprivan is an anesthetic widely used in operating rooms to induce unconsciousness.
sentences.cn: 得普利麻是一种广泛用于手术室以减轻病人潜意识的麻醉剂.

sentences.en: Do not delay treatment if ophthalmic anesthetic solution is not readily available.
sentences.cn: 如果眼部麻醉剂溶液不容易得到,不要延误治疗.

sentences.en: Egotism is the anesthetic that dulls the pain of stupidity.
sentences.cn: 自负是为了麻痹因为愚蠢带来痛楚的麻醉剂.

sentences.en: He was given a general anesthetic.
He was still under the influence of the anesthetic.
It would have to be done under anesthetic.
sentences.cn: 这个只能在麻醉的情況下做。

sentences.en: It's also used as a local anesthetic for other types of small procedures.
sentences.cn: 它还会在一些小的治疗过程中,作为局部麻醉剂使用。

sentences.en: Objective : To study the local anesthetic effect of daidzein.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究大豆苷元的局部麻醉作用.

sentences.en: Pharmacologically, alcohol is an anesthetic, not a stimulant.
sentences.cn: 从药理学上讲酒精是麻醉剂, 而不是兴奋剂.

sentences.en: Spinal anesthesia results from the infection of a local anesthetic into the cerebrospinal fluid.
sentences.cn: 脊椎麻醉将局麻药注入脑脊液.

sentences.en: Suitable for purifying anesthetic exhaust gas in the operation room.
sentences.cn: 本产品供临床医院手术室净化麻醉尾气使用.

sentences.en: The acceptance of cocaine as a local anesthetic was immediate, and in this way the history of local anesthesia differs sharply from that of general anesthesia.
sentences.cn: 可卡因很快被公认为是一种局部麻药，就这点看来，局部麻醉的历史和全身麻醉的发展史有明显的区别。

sentences.en: The addition of epinephrine to local anesthetic solutions produces vasoconstriction.
sentences.cn: 局麻药溶液中加入肾上腺素,使血管收缩.

sentences.en: The anesthetic will take effect in about four minutes.
sentences.cn: 四分钟左右麻药会起效.

sentences.en: The concept of ideal state of anesthetic is also mentioned.
sentences.cn: 同时提出“理想麻醉状态”的概念.

sentences.en: The injection itself may include local anesthetic and/or saline along with the steroid medication to give immediate pain relief and flush the area of inflammatory agents.
sentences.cn: 注射药物本身包括局部麻醉剂和和/或生理盐水以及激素类药物，达到迅速止痛并冲洗局部炎性介质的作用。

sentences.en: The peripartum anesthetic care of the pregnant woman is presented.
sentences.cn: 本例提出我们周产期间的麻醉照护.

sentences.en: What type of anesthetic will be used? How will it affect me?
sentences.cn: 手术过程中我将使用什么麻醉药？它会对我有何影响？

trans.tran_cn: 感觉缺失的，麻木的，麻醉的
（使局部或全身失去知觉的）麻醉剂，麻醉药
